content: I'm glad I could help you with your backpack search! As I take the bus down 3rd Avenue and walk the rest of the way to the office on Fridays, I've been thinking about how a new backpack could make my commute more comfortable. Adding 10-15 minutes to my commute is worth it to avoid the stress of sitting in traffic, and a good backpack can make all the difference. Anyway, back to the Patagonia Atom Sling 25L - do you think it would be a good fit for someone who likes to stay organized and has a lot of gear to carry?
